product_desc:
• StyLead (the “App” or the “Company”) is a fashion platform combining social media and e-commerce on mobile devices.
• Our social media feature enables users to share their own photos on which they can tag the brands of the products displayed; e-commerce offerings allows the App to charge small amounts of service commissions from online sellers who link their products to corresponding tags posted by users.
• StyLead is a social commerce concept dedicated to the discussion of fashion where users can purchase products in real time from photos shared on the platform.


Highlights
• Bridging the fashion gap in social networking platforms
• Attractive social media & online shopping marketplace
• Multiple revenue generation opportunities
• New standard of fashion influence & recognition
• Valuable database resource for fashion
• International entry as a New York based fashion-tech product
high_concept: Fashion Photo Sharing (Instagram), Social Networking (Facebook), E-commerce (Wish)
name: StyLead
